entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.8Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
